mapper.select: select id, name, logo, introduction, html_text, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_club where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_club(name, logo, introduction, html_text, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{name}, #{logo}, #{introduction}, #{htmlText}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into sys_club(name, logo, introduction, html_text, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.logo}, #{entity.introduction}, #{entity.htmlText}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into sys_club(name, logo, introduction, html_text, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.logo}, #{entity.introduction}, #{entity.htmlText}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update name = values(name), logo = values(logo), introduction = values(introduction), html_text = values(html_text), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update sys_club
name = #{name},
logo = #{logo},
introduction = #{introduction},
html_text = #{htmlText},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
